articles.title: This week's mattress, furniture and appliance deals: Wayfair, Lowe's and more
articles.author: Aurora Luxe Cooling
articles.summary: LG introduced a 24-inch wide, 2.4 Cu. Ft. compact stackable SMART Front Load Washer in white. The washer features steam and AI Fabric Sensor technology, along with Smart Pairing capabilities.

articles.title: Domino's open new store in Bridgwater with 100 free pizzas
articles.author: Molly Kirk
articles.summary: A store at Unit 1, Northgate Yard, opened on September 10th. The store gave out 100 free pizzas to the first 100 customers and offered any size pizza for £7.99 collection and £9.99 delivered during the first week. Customers also get 50% off pizzas for the first month.

articles.title: CrossWise AI Officially Launches to Redefine Digital Marketing with AI-Powered Campaign Creation and Insights
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: CrossWise launched its next-generation marketing platform, designed to make digital advertising simple, accessible, and data-driven for businesses of all sizes. The platform focuses on guided ad creation and centralized campaign management.

articles.title: CSIRT（Computer Security Incident Response Team）に関するネットワークスペシャリスト試験 - CyberChaos（さいばかおす）
articles.author: nichikon2
articles.summary: The user tried new features of Gemini.

articles.title: Bexar County Heritage Center honoring pioneers of Spanish-language media
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers streaming services through the KENS 5 app, enabling users to watch on their phones.

articles.title: Would you try sunscreen-flavored ice cream? One company is giving you the chance - WNKY News 40 Television
articles.author: Wnky Staff
articles.summary: Van Leeuwen Ice Cream and Carnival Cruise Line have collaborated to create Sunscreen Ice Cream, featuring coconut cream, cocoa butter, vanilla extract, and sea salt. While not currently available for purchase, the companies are gauging consumer interest through social media to determine if they will offer it for a limited time.

articles.title: 13-year-old accused of plotting terror attack accepts plea deal
articles.summary: KENS 5 enables streaming of its content on phones. This is achieved through the launch of the KENS 5 app.

articles.title: PAR Technology debuts Coach AI, first product in its new PAR AI intelligence suite – Central New York Business Journal
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: PAR Technology Corp. has launched PAR AI, an intelligence layer embedded in its product suite, featuring Coach AI, an intelligent assistant for restaurant operations. PAR AI-powered features are integrated into PAR's products, including POS, back office, loyalty, drive-thru, and payments. Additionally, a marketing-intelligence assistant for marketers, integrated into the PAR Engagement platform, is planned for release this fall.

articles.title: "$4,099 Remote Control Setup": Wild Land's Sky Rover Tent Features Pneumatic Lift System and Transparent Roof for Stargazing
articles.author: Hina Dinoo
articles.summary: Wild Land introduced the Sky Rover rooftop tent, featuring a remote-controlled pneumatic lift system and a transparent roof. Priced at $4,099, this tent includes accessories like a folding mini-table and urine bag. The Sky Rover was showcased at the Düsseldorf Caravan Salon targeting campers seeking luxury and comfort.

articles.title: Windows Developers Can Now Publish Apps To Microsoft's Store Without Fees
articles.summary: Microsoft has eliminated the one-time fee for publishing apps on its Windows Store. This change is intended to encourage more developers to publish applications on the platform.

articles.title: The best gadgets and gear we saw at IFA 2025 in Berlin
articles.author: Tony Ware
articles.summary: ECOVACS showcased the DEEBOT X11 OMNICYCLONE robot vacuum/mop. Dreame and Eufy presented stair-climbing robot vacuum systems, while NexLawn, a Dream sub-brand, revealed the Master X robot lawnmower. Valerion VisionMaster Max showcased its projector.

articles.title: Myntra & Sugar Cosmetics partner to launch Gen Z focused brand
articles.author: TNN
articles.summary: Myntra and Sugar Cosmetics have collaborated to launch Molten Beauty, a new Gen Z-focused brand offering vegan and cruelty-free skincare and makeup products. The launch portfolio includes over 50 SKUs with plans for further expansion. Myntra aims to solidify its position as a prime destination for Gen Z beauty consumers, while Sugar Cosmetics leverages Myntra's reach to broaden its accessibility to tech-savvy consumers across India.

articles.title: Samsung, LG take on Chinese robot vacuums by adding AI, security features
articles.author: Nami Matsuura
articles.summary: Samsung's newest robot vacuum features a steam sanitizing function. This function disinfects both floors and the vacuum itself. The company aims to compete on quality and convenience, enhancing value with AI chips and accurate sensors.

articles.title: Advanced Window Products Announces Strategic Partnership with SEO Guru Atlanta
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Advanced Window Products is partnering with SEO Guru Atlanta to expand its digital presence and better serve Houston homeowners. The collaboration will focus on boosting visibility for Advanced Window Products' energy-efficient windows, hurricane-rated windows, and door solutions.

articles.title: Advanced Window Products Secures Exclusive Rights to NT 1800 Series Hurricane-Rated Windows
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Advanced Window Products (AWP) has secured exclusive rights to distribute NT Windows' NT 1800 Series Hurricane-Rated Windows across Houston. The series features Cardinal 452 Neat Glass, offering durability, aesthetics, and easy-clean technology. This agreement represents a new distribution introduction for the NT Windows product in Houston through AWP.

articles.title: New spicy ‘hellfire' Babybel launched in supermarket – would you dare to try?
articles.author: Harvey Geh
articles.summary: Babybel launched the Fiery Hot Babybel, a spicy cheese snack, in collaboration with Stranger Things and is available in supermarkets like Sainsbury's for £2.25 per bag.  Earlier this year, Babybel launched Mini Babybel Protein, in collaboration with Bel UK, containing 5.2 grams of natural protein per portion, targeting consumers seeking to boost protein intake.

articles.title: The new Aston Martin luxury baby stroller will end your sense of reality
articles.author: Lindsey Weedston
articles.summary: Aston Martin, in partnership with egg®, has announced the launch of a luxury baby stroller. The strollers will debut in Cologne on 9/11 with a starting price of £2,500.

articles.title: Sony Xperia 10 VII: Future-Ready with Extended Battery Life and Enhanced Processing Power
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: The Sony Xperia 10 VII is anticipated to launch with an extended battery life of at least 5000mAh and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7-series processor. It will also include a 6.1-inch OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, and improvements to its camera system with enhanced night mode and 4K video recording. Sony's audio expertise will be highlighted via High-Resolution Audio, a 3.5mm headphone jack, and possibly INZONE spatial audio integration.

articles.title: Belarusian producers' brand zone opens in Moscow
articles.summary: A brand zone featuring Belarusian products has opened in a Moscow shopping mall. This project aims to increase brand recognition and competitiveness of Belarusian manufacturers by providing a convenient location for Russian consumers to access a wide selection of household appliances from well-known Belarusian brands. If successful, the brand zone concept will be extended to other stores in Russia.

articles.title: Testing Driving The All-New 2026 Nissan Leaf Electric Car
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nissan has launched an all-new Nissan Leaf. This new fully competitive EV has arrived after a long overdue wait of 15 years.

articles.title: Upgrades to ZIPS Car Wash Continue Across Knoxville
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ZIPS Car Wash is reopening four renovated locations in Knoxville on September 16th, offering free car washes. The Knoxville Chamber of Commerce will join ZIPS to unveil the upgraded properties. A Ribbon Cutting Ceremony will be held on Tuesday at 11am at 2935 Miller Place Way in Knoxville.

articles.title: Do You Need a Separate Day and Night Cream, or Is One Enough?
articles.summary: Isntree introduces Green Tea Fresh Emulsion, a lightweight moisturizer with green tea and Centella Asiatica, designed for combination and oily skin to balance oil and water levels. Isntree also offers Hyaluronic Acid Aqua Gel Cream, utilizing five molecular sizes of hyaluronic acid for deep hydration and skin barrier restoration. Garnier provides SkinActive 2-in-1 Brightening Serum Cream (Vitamin C) for skin brightening.

articles.title: From mattresses to cozy bedding, Silk & Snow should be on your radar for your next bedroom reset
articles.author: Kinsley Searles
articles.summary: Silk & Snow offers a variety of new home products, including the Hybrid Plush Mattress designed for side and hot sleepers, and the Wooden Bed Frame featuring easy assembly and sustainable materials. The company also provides the Down Alternative Comforter known for breathability, and the Knitted Weighted Blanket, crafted from heavyweight cotton yarn. These products are available with varying trial periods and warranties.

articles.title: Westfield company back at The Big E with new fair specials
articles.summary: Jelly Belly's Pools and Spas is offering a new batch of hot tub specials at a new fair. The specials are sponsored by Jelly Belly's Pools and Spas.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge – now available from Vodacom in South Africa
articles.author: mybroadband
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, offering next-generation performance and an ultra-sleek design, is now available in South Africa from Vodacom. It features a super-thin 5.8mm chassis, a 6.7-inch QHD+ display, and support for Galaxy AI and Google Gemini. The phone boasts a strong titanium frame and Corning Gorilla Glass for improved durability.

articles.title: Don't buy a new iPhone. Do this instead.
articles.author: Shira Ovide
articles.summary: Apple is launching preorders for its new iPhone 17 models. This marks the beginning of a period where smartphone companies and mobile carriers will heavily promote new phone purchases.

articles.title: Wings Group Founder Harjo Sutanto Dies, This Is His Track Record
articles.summary: Wings Group expanded its product portfolio by launching Mie Sedaap, challenging Indomie in the instant noodle market, and introduced Aquaviva, entering the bottled drinking water sector. The company also formed a joint venture with Lion Corporation Japan, which resulted in new products like Ciptadent toothpaste and Systema mouthwash.

articles.title: I swear by this Korean cleanser—and it's finally 20% off on Amazon
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Belif's Aqua Bomb Jelly Cleanser is currently 20% off on Amazon. The product is described as a jelly-to-foam face wash that cleanses without stripping the skin and is formulated with hydrating ingredients. The cleanser, part of belif's Aqua Bomb line, is suited for dry, combo, or slightly sensitive skin.

articles.title: These Are the 3 Best New Trader Joe's Products for 2025—And One May Be Even Better Than the Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter Cups
articles.author: Marisa Hillman
articles.summary: Trader Joe's has recently launched three new products: All the Things Cookies, priced at $4.49 for 14 cookies, Crustless Peanut Butter & Strawberry Jam Sandwiches, retailing for $3.79 for a box of four, and Vanilla Flavored Cold Foam Creamer, costing $4.49 for a 15-ounce can. Initial reviews and consumer reactions suggest these new items are popular and offer good value compared to similar products.

articles.title: Shajgoj welcomes Remark's homegrown brands to its e-commerce platform
articles.summary: Shajgoj has launched several new brands, including Remark Lily, Nior, Maxbeu, and Herlan, on its e-commerce platform. These 'Made in Bangladesh' brands aim to reshape the local beauty and personal care industry with world-class quality products now easily accessible to consumers across Bangladesh.

articles.title: Brand New Online Casinos USA No Deposit Bonuses for Real Money by Sweepstakes Table
articles.summary: SweepstakesTable.com's 2025 analysis highlights the launch of new online casinos in the USA, focusing on their no deposit bonus offerings to attract players. These new casinos differentiate themselves through innovative technology, player-first bonus structures, instant verification, and transparent withdrawal processes. The report also emphasizes the importance of responsible gambling tools and the evolving regulatory landscape impacting these new operators.

articles.title: How an over-the-air update made Quilt's heat pumps more powerful
articles.author: Tim De Chant
articles.summary: Quilt, a heat pump startup, launched a software and firmware update that increased the heating and cooling capacities of their heat pumps by over 20%. This update, applied to existing units in customer homes, was made possible by higher quality sensors and monitoring, allowing Quilt to broaden its customer base without developing a new model.

articles.title: SEOPage.ai Launches New AI Agent for Strategic Traffic Acquisition: Revolutionizing SEO with Autonomous Page Creation
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: SEOPage.ai has launched an AI Agent, an autonomous platform that automates the creation, optimization, and maintenance of SEO-optimized pages. This new platform aims to capture competitor traffic and target high-value industry keywords. It supports five specialized page types and integrates with analytics tools, offering a free trial for up to five pages and professional tiers for scalability.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge now available in South Africa: an engineering marvel of new ...
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. revealed the Galaxy S25 Edge, a category-defining slim smartphone joining the Galaxy S series. The Galaxy S25 Edge illustrates a commitment to premium experiences.

articles.title: One Plan, Three Solutions: Buy, Protect, and Upgrade Your Next Phone With Ease
articles.summary: Maxis Postpaid offers the Galaxy Z Flip7 for RM75/month along with bundled services like Device Care and trade-in upgrades. This plan packages purchasing, protection, and upgrading into a single offering without contract penalties, providing flexibility and secure data transfer assistance.

articles.title: Bengaluru's Greenspace Herbs enters South Korea with ‘Quantum Ayurveda'
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company plans to introduce Quantum Ayurveda formulations. These formulations represent two new product lines for the company.

articles.title: Samsung's trifold smartphone might be here sooner than you think
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly in the final stages of developing a tri-fold smartphone, potentially entering the market soon. This move could increase competition in the currently limited tri-fold phone market, potentially reducing costs for consumers.

articles.title: OnePlus to launch phones with Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 Pro
articles.author: gizmochina
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the Ace 6 and OnePlus 15 in China, followed by a Turbo-branded phone. These phones will feature unreleased Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 and 8s Gen 4 Pro chipsets (model numbers SM8850 and SM8735 Pro respectively).

articles.title: Amazon dehumidifier a 'gamechanger' for banishing damp and mould
articles.author: newsdesk@devonlive.com
articles.summary: Finade's 2.2-litre dehumidifier is currently on sale at Amazon, reduced by 44% to £55.99 and praised for its ease of use. The article also highlights the HOMCOM 10L/Day Portable Quiet Dehumidifier, available at Robert Dyas for £79.99, and the VonHaus 20L Dehumidifier with Laundry Mode, priced at £129.99 from VonHaus, both offering various features like sleep mode and automatic shut-off.

articles.title: It's time for Meta to add a display to its smart glasses
articles.author: Victoria Song
articles.summary: Meta's Ray-Ban smart glasses have seen considerable success, with 2 million pairs sold and plans to increase production to 10 million by 2026.  Meta is expected to unveil a new version of its smart glasses with a display, potentially named Hypernova, at its upcoming Connect event.

articles.title: This New 131-Foot Superyacht Is Like a Tuscan Villa on the High Seas
articles.author: Tristan Rutherford
articles.summary: Benetti has launched the B.NEOS yacht, a 131-foot model combining sailing yacht sleekness with motoryacht speed, featuring a hybrid diesel-electric propulsion system. Designed for a younger, more understated clientele, the B.NEOS emphasizes functional design and simpler elegance, moving away from excessive opulence with multifunctional areas and a focus on creating a relaxed, home-like atmosphere.

articles.title: SEOPage.ai Launches New AI Agent for Strategic Traffic Acquisition: Revolutionizing SEO with Autonomous Page Creation
articles.summary: SEOPage.ai has launched its AI Agent, an autonomous platform designed to automate the creation, optimization, and maintenance of SEO-optimized pages. The AI Agent supports five specialized page types, targeting comparison, research, and problem-solving user intents, with plans to expand to over 100 page types. The platform offers flexible pricing plans, including a free trial and professional tiers, to cater to startups and enterprises.

articles.title: Vicon's NEXT Modular Camera System Receives Security Today's 2025 New Product of the Year Award
articles.author: Vicon Industries Inc.
articles.summary: Vicon's NEXT Modular Camera System won Security Today's 2025 New Product of the Year award in the category of AI Video Surveillance Cameras. NEXT is described as an 'AI-first camera system' designed to address current security challenges and future possibilities.

articles.title: A new season kicks off for Dutch Wasabi
articles.summary: Dutch Wasabi has begun the new season for Dutch-grown ginger, highlighting the exceptional quality achieved through improved propagation material and cultivation practices. The ginger, known for its juiciness, thin skin, and aromatic flavor, is now available in various packaging options, including individual pieces, flowpacks, and 5-kilo boxes.

articles.title: Ultraloq adds Android tap-to-unlock to its Apple Home Key smart lock
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Ultraloq's parent company, Xthings, is releasing a free software upgrade to the U Home app for the Ultraloq Bolt NFC smart lock. This upgrade enables NFC tap-to-unlock functionality with compatible Android phones, making it one of the first locks to offer this feature across both iOS and Android platforms.

articles.title: NDTV Tech360 debuts on September 13, 2025
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: NDTV is launching a new multimedia tech platform called Tech360 on September 13. The show will focus on the narrative of ideas and the influence of technology on our lives, airing on NDTV 24x7 and NDTV Profit, as well as across NDTV Digital and social media.

articles.title: Moto Pad 60 Neo launched in India, offers MediaTek Dimensity 6300
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto Pad 60 Neo tablet in India, featuring a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC and a 7040mAh battery. The tablet includes the Moto Pen and is available for Rs 17,999 (8GB + 128GB), with introductory offers reducing the price to Rs 12,999. The tablet is available on Flipkart, Motorola India Website as well as offline.

articles.title: A new Astro Bot-themed PS5 controller is now available for preorder
articles.author: Brandon Russell
articles.summary: Sony is launching a new 'Joyful' version of the Astro Bot DualSense wireless controller for PlayStation 5 on October 30th for $84.99. The new controller features a slightly different design with squinting eyes on the touchpad and includes the standard DualSense features like haptic feedback and adaptive triggers. Preorders have begun at the PlayStation store.

articles.title: 8 Best Origins Products That Stand the Test of Time
articles.author: Christa Joanna Lee
articles.summary: Origins offers a range of skin-care products like the Youthtopia Apple Butter Cleansing Balm, Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask, Checks and Balances Frothy Face Wash, Youthtopia Refining Apple Peel, Ginger Soufflé Whipped Body Cream, Plantscription Active Wrinkle Correction Serum, GinZing Glow-Boosting Moisturizer, and A Perfect World Age-Defense Moisturizer with SPF 40. These products include cleansers, masks, moisturizers, and serums designed to address various skin concerns such as hydration, pore cleansing, wrinkle correction, and sun protection.

articles.title: Meet the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge – Now available in South Africa!
articles.author: Boksburg News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. has introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone with a titanium body. It features an ultra-high-resolution camera system with improved low-light performance and enhanced Galaxy AI integration with third-party apps and Google's Gemini.

articles.title: First AI-Powered Product Options App SectionlyAI Officially Launches on Shopify
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Cyberklick DTC, under eclicktech, launched Sectionly AI Product Options in August 2025, an AI-powered Shopify app designed for intelligent product customization. This app streamlines complex configurations and coding processes, reducing them to as little as 30 seconds.

articles.title: 3 White Noise Machines That Will Make You Sleep Like a Baby
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: The article introduces three sound machines: LectroFan Classic, Yogasleep Dohm Uno, and Sound+Sleep High Fidelity Sound Machine. LectroFan Classic offers fan sounds and white noises. Yogasleep Dohm Uno provides pure, analog white noise using real air movement. Sound+Sleep High Fidelity Sound Machine offers realistic soundtracks like train, waterfall, and city sounds with adjustable 'richness' settings.

articles.title: Smooth away wrinkles FAST with 30% off the miracle night cream that has over 4,000 five-star reviews: 'It has completely taken away my deep lines'
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Onekind is offering a 30% discount on their Dream Cream Nighttime Moisturizer with code DREAM30 until November 30, 2025. The Dream Cream Nighttime Moisturizer aims to hydrate, smooth fine lines, and calm irritated skin with ingredients like squalane, rosehip oil, and chamomile. It is clinically tested and safe for sensitive skin.

articles.title: Meet the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge – Now available in South Africa!
articles.author: Content Supplied
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone featuring a titanium body, AI-enabled camera, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform. The Galaxy S25 Edge is now available in Titanium Jetblack, priced at R24,999 cash or with post-paid deals starting from R999pm x36m, with additional offers on the Galaxy Tab S10 FE 5G and Galaxy Watch8 Classic LTE for contracts made between 01 and 30 September 2025.

articles.title: 10 Best Drugstore Shampoos Tested 2025, Approved by Hair Stylists
articles.author: Alanna Martine Kilkeary
articles.summary: Aveeno introduces Apple Cider Vinegar Clarifying Shampoo, containing apple cider vinegar and colloidal oat, priced under $10. OGX offers Nourishing + Coconut Milk Moisturizing Shampoo, with coconut milk and shea butter, available for $7. Both shampoos target specific hair needs and are color safe.

articles.title: These 54 Cheap Versions Of Expensive Products Are So Good You Might Not Spot The Difference
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights several affordable alternatives to popular and often expensive products.  Essence's bronzing drops are compared to Drunk Elephant, and e.l.f.'s mascara is positioned as a cheaper option to Blinc. Additionally, a range of beauty, fashion, and skincare items such as lip tints, body lotions, and athletic wear are presented as budget-friendly alternatives to brands like Charlotte Tilbury, Sol de Janeiro, and Lululemon, providing consumers with new, cost-effective choices.

articles.title: Sony Unveils Xperia 10 VII With Revamped Camera Module
articles.author: Lowyat NET
articles.summary: Sony has unveiled the Xperia 10 VII, its newest mid-range smartphone featuring a redesigned horizontal camera layout with a 50MP Sony Exmor RS main sensor and a dedicated shutter button. The phone sports a 6.1-inch Full HD+ OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and is protected by Corning's Gorilla Glass Victus 2.

articles.title: Own The Latest Smartphones At Your Convenience With Maxis
articles.author: Lowyat NET
articles.summary: Maxis is offering plans for new smartphone purchases, allowing customers to spread device costs over time with 0% interest. Maxis provides a complimentary three-month Maxis Device Care coverage with smartphone purchases, and Maxis Postpaid 139 subscribers and above receive a free upgrade to Maxis Device Care Plus.

articles.title: Zong Unveils OZGPT, a Smarter Digital Companion for Everyone
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Zong, a technology innovation company in Pakistan, has launched OZGPT, a next-generation conversational AI service. OZGPT is accessible across multiple platforms and offers features like instant answers, task scheduling, translation, and image stylization with flexible prepaid and postpaid plans.

articles.title: New Look's £25 joggers that 'look smart' and are 'super comfy'
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its wide leg joggers, priced at £24.99, which customers are praising for their comfort, style, and suitability for both casual and office wear. The trousers are available in various autumn colors and described as bridging the gap between smart and casual attire.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge now available in South Africa: an engineering marvel of new slim hardware innovation
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone featuring a titanium body, AI-enabled camera, and Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform. The device is available in Titanium Jetblack, with pricing starting at R24,999, and includes offers like the Galaxy Tab S10 FE 5G or Galaxy Watch8 Classic LTE with a contract, along with six months of Google AI Pro.

articles.title: How this Entrepreneur Built the Architecture for Rapid AI Experiments
articles.author: Charulatha Gouda
articles.summary: Wishroll has launched several apps like Kiwi and Status. These apps are built using a modular architecture and AI to enhance user experience and reduce costs. They have launched 8 apps in the year 2024.

articles.title: DoubleDragon launches P10.9-billion fixed-rate bond offering
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: DoubleDragon Corp. initiated sales on Friday.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Mobility: Moto Pad 60 NEO's Unmatched Tablet Experience
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto pad 60 NEO, a new tablet featuring an 11-inch 2.5K display with a 90Hz refresh rate. The device includes a moto pen with 4096 levels of pressure sensitivity and is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 5G processor. It also features 5G connectivity and a 7040mAh battery and is available for INR 12,999.

articles.title: Magic Cue on Pixel 10: A week of lies and disappointments
articles.author: Conor Cawley
articles.summary: Google Pixel 10 series introduces Magic Cue, a new feature designed to provide suggestions across Google services. However, initial user experience reveals the feature to be lacking, with instances of incorrect information, hallucinations, and unhelpful prompts. Despite its current state, the technology shows potential for improvement within the Android ecosystem.

articles.title: 7 Best AI Tools for Product Photography
articles.author: Tonny Franzen
articles.summary: Several AI tools, including X-Design AI Background Generator, Pebblely, Claid.AI, Mokker.AI, Flair.AI, Luminar Neo, and Remove.bg, offer solutions for generating high-quality product images.  X-Design AI Background Generator creates AI background images, Pebblely specializes in images for skincare, beverages, furniture, and jewellery, while Remove.bg focuses on quick background removal, and Flair.AI helps to mix products with AI-generated props. Luminar Neo includes tools like Enhance AI, Relight AI, and Structure AI to help improve image clarity.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Leaks: Price, Release Date In India, Design, Camera, Specs, Everything You Need To Know
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch its next-generation flagship, the OnePlus 15, which will feature a refreshed camera system using the in-house DetailMax Engine and upgraded internals, ending its partnership with Hasselblad. The phone is expected to have a 6.78-inch LTPO OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate, a Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset, and a 7000mAh battery. It is rumored to be launched in October in China, followed by an India launch in January, with a starting price of around Rs 69,999 in India.

articles.title: Swig coming to St. Peters next month
articles.author: Hannah Wyman
articles.summary: Swig is opening its first St. Louis-area location in St. Peters on October 11. The store will offer customizable fountain drinks, energy drinks, teas, cookies and pretzel bites. Swig is expanding nationally and already has locations in other states.

articles.title: Google Nano Banana AI: Create 3D Figurines Online for Free (Step-by-Step Guide + Prompt)
articles.author: Vani Verma
articles.summary: Google launched Nano Banana AI, a free tool that generates 3D figurines from text prompts. Users can create these figurines by describing what they imagine, and the AI builds the model, which can then be rotated and downloaded. The tool is designed to be easy to use and requires no drawing or sculpting skills.

articles.title: Appier Drives GenAI-Powered Creatives Transformation with AdCreative.ai, Empowering Hong Kong Brands to Accelerate into the Agentic AI Marketing Era
articles.author: the Sundaily
articles.summary: Appier, an AI-native SaaS company, hosted the GenAI for Marketing Asia Pacific roadshow in Hong Kong, showcasing its Generative AI-powered creative platform AdCreative.ai. This platform combines creative power with Appier's enterprise Agentic AI solutions to enhance data integration, predictive analytics, and personalized engagement.

articles.title: I tried Tim Hortons' new Thanksgiving sandwich. What's in it and is it worth it?
articles.author: Itai Buenahora
articles.summary: Tim Hortons has released a new Thanksgiving sandwich. This limited-time offering is now available at Tim Hortons locations across Canada.

articles.title: Appier Drives GenAI-Powered Creatives Transformation with AdCreative.ai, Empowering Hong Kong Brands to Accelerate into the Agentic AI Marketing Era
articles.summary: Appier is showcasing its Generative AI-powered creative platform, AdCreative.ai, which helps brands scale creativity, reduce costs, and improve performance. Several Hong Kong brands, including Future Salad, Lukfook Jewellery, and The Korner, have successfully adopted AdCreative.ai to streamline creative production and enhance marketing ROI, achieving significant improvements in CTR, CPC, CVR, and ROAS.

articles.title: AdMaker.ai: Streamline Ad Creation Effortlessly
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: AdMaker.ai launched an AI-powered platform for streamlined ad creation across digital channels. The platform converts product URLs into video ads and generates high-quality visuals. It offers features like an AI Video Ad Maker, AI Product Image Generator, and AI Avatar Generator to simplify the ad creation process for businesses.

articles.title: Philip Morris International Releases 2025 Sustainability Materiality Report
articles.author: David Fraser
articles.summary: Philip Morris International (PMI) is evolving its portfolio beyond tobacco, focusing on smoke-free products like IQOS, General Snus, and ZYN nicotine pouches, which are available in 97 markets and used by over 41 million adults. PMI has invested over $14 billion in developing these products, some of which have received FDA authorization, including Modified Risk Tobacco Product authorizations.

articles.title: 7 of the best website builders
articles.summary: The article reviews seven website builders for generating sales, promoting brands, and building online portfolios. It highlights usability, templates, customization, scalability, pricing, customer support, and other relevant features as key considerations when choosing a website builder.

articles.title: Meituan launches AI agent to boost food delivery business
articles.author: Luz Ding
articles.summary: Meituan has launched a new AI agent app called Xiaomei, powered by the LongCat-model, to enhance its food delivery and local services. Xiaomei allows users to order meals via voice command and book restaurants. This launch intensifies the competition with Alibaba and JD.com in China's food delivery market.

articles.title: Globe Business drives real-world AI adoption, transforming how teams collaborate and deliver
articles.author: The Philippine Star
articles.summary: Globe employees have created over 400 AI copilots using the company's 'AI Kitchen' to improve daily tasks. Google Cloud demonstrated AgentSpace, which allows users to build and deploy AI agents easily, while Zoom presented its AI Companion, which enhances meetings with real-time summaries and action items. These AI tools aim to improve productivity and integrate AI into daily workflows.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 5G Goes On Sale In India Tonight On Amazon: Here Are Our First Impressions
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Lava launched the Lava Bold N1 5G phone in India, priced at Rs. 7,499 for the 4GB RAM + 64GB storage variant and Rs. 7,999 for the 4GB RAM + 128GB model. The phone has a 6.75-inch HD+ display, 13-megapixel AI dual rear camera supporting 4K video recording, and a 5000mAh battery with Type-C charging.

articles.title: ‘SSSS.Dynazenon' Gets New Diecast Figure Courtesy Of Ember Toys
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Ember Toys has revealed a new diecast figure of the main mecha from 'SSSS.Dynazenon', following its inclusion in 'Super Robot Wars Y'.

articles.title: Wadan Developments opens sales gallery and unveils first landmark project
articles.author: DXB
articles.summary: Wadan Developments has launched its first residential community, Nuvana by Wadan, in Dubai Islands and opened a sales gallery in Downtown Dubai. All available units in Nuvana were sold by the close of the event. The residential community includes features such as voice-controlled smart features, including Siri and Alexa integration for lighting and curtains.

articles.title: Virtual Vistas: How WhatsApp's AI Backgrounds Turn Every Video Call into a Story
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: WhatsApp, a Meta product, has launched AI-generated backgrounds for video calls.  This new feature allows users to create custom backgrounds by describing a setting, which Meta's AI then generates in real time. The service aims to offer users a more immersive and expressive video call experience.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Primark expands with new store in Brandon, Florida
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Primark is expanding its U.S. presence by opening new stores, including one at Brandon Exchange in Florida. This expansion coincides with the retailer's 10-year anniversary in the American market, showcasing its successful growth.

articles.title: เจอแล้ว ! AI ที่เกิดมาเพื่อเดาหวย:เครื่องมือสร้างเลขเด็ดที่จะอาจช่วยให้คุณถูกลอตเตอรี่
articles.author: siamblockchain
articles.summary: Easy-Peasy.AI, a new AI-powered website, has been created to bring AI innovation to the world of gambling and risk-taking.

articles.title: Snow-blowing, lawn-mowing robots clear the way for China's tech expansion
articles.author: He Huifeng
articles.summary: Yarbo, a Shenzhen-based manufacturer, has introduced its hybrid snow-blowing, lawn-mowing robots for overseas markets. The company raised US$3.45 million on Kickstarter and delivered 1,000 units of the robots. Key features include custom low-temperature batteries, adaptive blades, wireless charging and self-heating batteries, leading to 6,000 presale orders at prices ranging from US$4,000 to US$7,000.

articles.title: Can Walmart win where Game failed?
articles.author: Moneyweb
articles.summary: Walmart, through its subsidiary Massmart, plans to launch Walmart-branded stores in South Africa by the end of the year. These stores will offer a range of products, including fresh groceries, household essentials, apparel, and technology. This move represents a new retail offering from Walmart in the South African market.

articles.title: 'How New Is Your New?' Max Fashion Redefines Style with Kalki Koechlin; New Drops. New Styles. Every Week.
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Max Fashion launched the "How New Is Your New?" campaign, featuring Kalki Koechlin, to promote the constant introduction of new styles and drops every week. The campaign encourages consumers to explore new looks and express themselves through fashion, available both in-store and online.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Connecticut's credit rating upgrades signal fiscal recovery
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network coverage from big cities to small towns. According to Ookla Speedtest, T-Mobile is America's best mobile network in the US. This supports communities with connectivity.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Important cookie recall affects Newington stores
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Public Market of Newington had cookies recalled due to undeclared nuts, sesame, and food dyes. Customers are urged to return the products for a refund.

articles.title: Huawei Redefines Device Care with Free Global Service Upgrade Program
articles.author: mybroadband
articles.summary: Huawei launched its Service Upgrade Program, providing free services for users. The program includes services such as device diagnosis, system renewal, and round-trip shipping at no extra cost. Huawei aims to provide a higher level of consumer care through this initiative.

articles.title: Moto Pad 60 NEO Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 5G Processor; Check Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Moto Pad 60 NEO in India. The tablet features an 11-inch 2.5K display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300 5G processor and is priced at INR 17,999, but will be offered at INR 12,999 with launch offers on Flipkart starting September 22nd.

articles.title: ByteDance launches Nano Banana rival Seedream 4.0: Next-gen AI images, highlights, and advantages
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: ByteDance has launched Seedream 4.0, a professional-grade AI image generation tool designed for speed, accuracy, and creative consistency. Seedream 4.0 generates 2K-resolution images in under two seconds and allows users to upload up to six reference images to maintain visual identity. It targets professionals working at scale with text-to-image generation, image editing, and style consistency.

articles.title: Fresh spring ingredients you need in your kitchen and recipes to make the most of them
articles.author: Lutho Pasiya
articles.summary: Fry's has launched high-protein gyro wraps. The wraps contain spiced no-chick'n pieces and various ingredients like lemon juice, olive oil, and fresh herbs for marinade. The gyros are assembled with flatbread, tzatziki, onions, and fresh greens.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Eddie Andrews from Johnston enters Iowa governor race
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile claims to have invested billions to improve their network, leading to it being named America's best mobile network in the US according to Ookla Speedtest.

articles.title: Apple watch hypertension detection coming next week after FDA nod
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Apple announced a new feature during its most recent product launch.

articles.title: Sneak peek inside the drive-thru Starbucks in Alsager which opened today
articles.author: The Editor
articles.summary: Starbucks has launched a new drive-thru location in Alsager. The new store features a drive-thru service, a dog-friendly in-store area, and a quieter section suitable for hotdesking. The first 100 customers received a free reusable cup.

articles.title: SMS Gateway Provider
articles.summary: DIGINTRA encourages businesses to enhance their operations using their SMS gateway API. They are offering a free trial to new users who sign up.

articles.title: Differentiating through fresh product offerings
articles.author: Agar Wal Ekwensi
articles.summary: Mega Sardines entered the market 25 years ago. Mega Prime Foods Inc. positioned Mega Sardines as a fresh and quality brand, differentiating it from existing competitors.

articles.title: 7 Game-Changing Shampoos Curly Hair Girls Swear By
articles.summary: Several new hair care products are now available, each formulated with unique ingredients to enhance curl definition, hydration, and shine. The products feature components such as Manuka Honey, Ceramides, Vitamin C, AHAs, Baobab Protein, Seaweed, Coconut, Hibiscus, Coconut Water, Jojoba Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, and Castor Oil, aiming to cater to various needs of curly and wavy hair, offering frizz control and nourishment.

articles.title: ‘It was a bit of a shock': Aussie comes up with multi-million dollar idea in the middle of lockdown
articles.author: Mary Madigan
articles.summary: Slick Hair Company, founded by Mia Plecic, launched "The Slick Stick" in December 2020, a hair product designed to smooth hairstyles. The initial investment was $500, with the first batch selling out in days, leading to significant growth and expansion of the product line to include items like Wax Stick, Smoothing Brush and more. The company's products are now available in over 5,000 retail stores worldwide.

articles.title: 26 Hidden Gems To Grab Before They Go Viral
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro launched a limited-edition Cheirosa 71 shimmering body cream that hydrates, softens, and evens skin tone with a caramelized vanilla and toasted macadamia nut scent. Chasin' Rabbits introduced an eye cream roller that dispenses a brightening under-eye cream for moisturizing and de-puffing the under-eye area.

articles.title: Best TV deal: Get the 65-inch LG evo AI TV for its lowest price yet
articles.author: Brittany Vincent
articles.summary: LG is offering the 65-Inch Class QNED evo AI 4K TV for a discounted price of $849.99, reduced from its usual $999.99. This 15% discount represents the lowest price available as of September 10th.

articles.title: Kyndryl and VML Form Global Partnership to Unlock the Future of Customer Experience
articles.author: Kyndryl
articles.summary: Kyndryl and VML have partnered to develop a new service leveraging AI, data, and emerging technology to reimagine customer engagement with brands. This collaboration aims to enable brands to design personalized customer experiences powered by modern infrastructure.

articles.title: 하리수, ‘이 기억' 떠올리며 눈물 펑펑… 여전히 고통스럽다 고백
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: AudioNova seeks individuals to test a revolutionary hearing aid. The company seems to be launching a new product in the healthcare or consumer electronics domain.

articles.title: Waitrose sale slashes prices with up to 50% off Oral-B, Bird's Eye, Fairy and more
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Waitrose has launched the Great Savings Event, offering discounts of up to 50% on various brands, including Oral-B, Bird's Eye, and Fairy. The event, running until October 7th, features reduced prices on household staples like Colgate toothpaste and Ariel laundry detergent, as well as savings on brands such as Innocent, Aveeno and Lily's Kitchen. Waitrose also offers a delivery service, with standard slots costing between £2 and £4, or a delivery pass for unlimited deliveries.

articles.title: Waitrose sale has up to 50% off brands such as Oral-B and Bird's Eye
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Waitrose has launched a 'Great Savings Event' until October 7, offering discounts on various products including household staples, toiletries, and frozen items. The event includes up to 50% off on brands like Colgate and Ariel, and discounts on Gourmet Burger Kitchen and Tropicana. Additionally, Waitrose offers a delivery service with various options, including a delivery pass for frequent shoppers.

articles.title: 26 Ways To Look More ~Polished~ Without A Lot Of Work
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: Maybelline introduces Dream BB Cream with SPF 30 for hydration, pore blurring, and complexion evening. Goody launches spin hair pins for creating perfect updos. Supergoop! offers Glowscreen SPF 40 containing hyaluronic acid, vitamin B5, and niacinamide for brightened complexion and sun protection. Elizabeth Mott offers brow gel with a pomade formula. Hanes offers a wire-free bra with a second-skin feel for comfort.

articles.title: 김혜수 선물받았다는 ‘이 신발'… 얼굴 부기까지 쫙 빼준다?
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Nexa offers a cleaning product that eliminates dirt with a simple spray-and-leave application.

articles.title: The Latest DreamCloud Hybrid Mattress Hits the Sweet Spot of Support and Value
articles.author: Julia Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud released the newest iteration of its Classic Hybrid mattress in May. This updated mattress maintains the hybrid makeup of foam and coils, despite challenges in the supply chain.

articles.title: Gentle Monster's New Store in Seoul Is Its Craziest Yet
articles.summary: Gentle Monster launched its new headquarters and flagship store, Haus Nowhere Seoul, featuring multiple brands. The store also includes the newly launched brand Nuflaat which features innovative kitchen and dinnerware. In addition, Gentle Monster introduced its Bold Collection eyewear, and Tamburins launched its latest scent, Sunshine.

articles.title: Order a Case for Your New iPhone 17 Ahead of Tomorrow's Preorder Launch
articles.author: Aashna Gheewalla
articles.summary: Cases for the new iPhone 17 lineup, ranging from leather and minimalist to rugged options with wallets and kickstands, are available for preorder starting tomorrow.

articles.title: FrieslandCampina WAMCO reaffirms innovation drive with new product
articles.author: Gilbert Ekugbe
articles.summary: FrieslandCampina WAMCO Nigeria PLC has launched Peak Dairy Creamer in Nigeria in January 2025, targeting consumers seeking affordable dairy options. The product, made from skimmed milk and milk solids, aims to transform tea and coffee experiences while providing a source of calcium and vitamins A & D. A 'Taste the Goodness' campaign ran from April to June 2025 to boost awareness and trial of the new product.

articles.title: Aldi and Costa Coffee introduce new products including nostalgic dessert
articles.author: Andrea Blazquez
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new ice cream flavors inspired by British cakes, including Cherry Bakewell, Red Velvet, and Birthday Cake. Costa Coffee has launched its new autumn menu featuring the Maple Hazel Latte, Hazel Hot Chocolate, and Maple Hazel Frappe, along with ready-to-drink Double Shot + Caramel.

articles.title: A working laundromat is now home to a pizza shop with a difference
articles.author: Tomas Telegramma
articles.summary: Al Dente Enoteca team launched Sega, a new eatery in Carlton, Melbourne, specializing in pizza chiusa - a stuffed pizza. Sega operates inside a laundromat and offers a variety of pizza chiusa options, St Ali coffee, and Tarts Anon sweets. Sega's official launch event was held on September 14, featuring DJ sets and free samples.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz ‘Mini' G-Class teased ahead of range expansion
articles.author: Ben Zachariah
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz has released a teaser image showcasing the 'Mini G' alongside the G-Class, indicating a future product introduction.

articles.title: Lexus' latest trademark filing points to new luxury EV
articles.author: Ben Zachariah
articles.summary: Lexus might introduce an all-new model to Australian showrooms. This follows the discovery of a new trademark in Australia, hinting at the potential launch of a new Lexus vehicle.

articles.title: 2026 MG ZS Essence Turbo review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: The MG ZS Turbo Essence is presented as the optimal choice in the new-generation ZS range, offering a balance of sophistication, agreeable pricing, and a punchier powertrain compared to other variants.  It builds upon the improvements of the new-generation ZS, providing a more refined driving experience. The Turbo Essence includes features like selectable drive modes and climate control, enhancing its appeal.

articles.title: Chinese smart devices give AI ecosystem edge
articles.summary: Xiaomi is expanding its product line to include smart devices, entering Southeast Asia with large home appliances, and planning to export electric vehicles by 2027 to build a global human-vehicle-home ecosystem. iFlytek reported tripled year-on-year sales of overseas AI hardware, with AI laptops gaining popularity in Japan and South Korea. Lenovo held a 21 percent share of the AI PC market in the second quarter.

articles.title: Power, Performance, and Price: Why Optimum Mobile is Changing the Game for Our Customers (Altice USA Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Optimum launched Optimum Mobile, aiming to provide an affordable wireless option complementing its existing Internet and TV services. Initially, the service was not intended as a primary business driver.

articles.title: Vroom Delivery Taps Instacart Carrot Ads to Power Retail Media for Convenience Stores Nationwide
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: Vroom Delivery will integrate Instacart's Sponsored Product and Display ads into 3,500 convenience stores. This collaboration introduces a new advertising service to enhance the convenience store shopping experience through Instacart's platform.

articles.title: Danganronpa 2×2 Announced for PC, PS5, Xbox Series X/S and Nintendo Switch 2, Out in 2026
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Spike Chunsoft announced Danganronpa 2x2, a revamped version of Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair, during a recent Nintendo Direct. The announcement included the release of a trailer for the new title.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Receives Final Trailer With New Mega Evolutions, Mega Dimension DLC Announced
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Game Freak announced the Mega Dimension DLC for Pokémon Legends: Z-A. This DLC, focusing on a new Mythical Pokémon Hoopa, becomes available after completing the main story. The company also showcased some new Mega Evolutions in its final trailer.

articles.title: T-Mobile Wants to Give You the New iPhone 17 Pro for Free
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A promotion allows customers to trade in any phone, regardless of its condition, to receive the new '17 Pro' at no cost. This offer suggests the launch or availability of the new '17 Pro' product.

articles.title: Motorola launches "moto pad 60 NEO" Segment's slimmest & lightest 5G pad with Segment's Only ...
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Moto launched the new moto pad 60 NEO. Images of the launch were provided.

articles.title: Xoomed In
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Hero is introducing the Xoom 160, a new scooter that promises ADV spirit. The article questions whether the scooter fulfills this promise.

articles.title: Fark Weird News Quiz - September 12, 2025 (Hard Version)
articles.summary: Gucci is introducing a steel water bottle with a GG Monogram coated fabric holder, a Gucci logo, and a Web canvas strap, presented as part of the Pre-Fall 2025 collection. The water bottle is priced at $1050.
